docs.text: Keep our mob safe and help stop the spread. Head to the following link to find the latest newsletter with key information on the #COVIDSafe app, staying healthy, keeping up with medical appointments and more. https://www.health.gov.au/resources/publications/key-updates-for-aboriginal-and-torres-strait-islander-communities-29-april-2020 #coronavirus #covid19 #keepourmobsafe
This daily infographic provides a quick view of the current coronavirus (#COVID19) situation in Australia. Visit: http://www.health.gov.au/resources/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-at-a-glance

We are all playing our part to help flatten the curve. Let’s continue to do the right thing, such as physical distancing and staying home where possible. The plan is working and we are saving lives. http://www.health.gov.au/news/health-alerts/novel-coronavirus-2019-ncov-health-alert #coronavirus #covid19

There is still no evidence of effectiveness for any treatments for #COVID19. The National COVID-19 Clinical Evidence Taskforce has significant concerns about the potential harms of unproven treatments. Read the weekly update here: http://www.covid19evidence.net.au

The Community Visitors Scheme is about establishing phone and virtual friendships with older people in the community. Volunteering for the CVS can be a rewarding experience. You can make a positive difference to their life as well as your own. Learn more: http://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/community-visitors-scheme-cvs

The COVIDSafe app speeds up the process of finding people who have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19. This means you’ll be contacted more quickly if you are at risk. Learn more: http://www.health.gov.au/resources/apps-and-tools/covidsafe-app

If you have an overseas phone number, you cannot register for the COVIDSafe app, even if you live in Australia. We are looking at ways to fix this issue. We are looking at ways to make the app available in the App Store for other countries.

Help Australia control outbreaks of coronavirus by downloading the COVIDSafe app. This highly secure app enables public health workers to notify people who may have been exposed to COVID-19 more quickly and effectively. Learn more: http://www.health.gov.au/resources/apps-and-tools/covidsafe-app

While we are keeping physically distant, it is more important than ever that we remain socially and emotionally connected. If you need mental health information and support, visit https://headtohealth.gov.au/covid-19-support/covid-19 #coronavirus #COVID19
FRIDAY UPDATE: Coronavirus (#COVID19) - Current situation and case numbers https://www.health.gov.au/news/health-alerts/novel-coronavirus-2019-ncov-health-alert
